verbose_text: Lack of TBK-1 expression and co-depletion of both optineurin and TBK-1 leads to the accumulation of protein aggregates to the same extent as depletion of optineurin alone, suggesting that optineurin function in aggrephagy is highly dependent on, and mediated by, TBK-1.
evidence: TBK-1 leads to the accumulation of protein aggregates to the same extent as depletion of optineurin alone, suggesting that optineurin function in aggrephagy is highly dependent on, and mediated by, TBK-1
